subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Pete Newell, the Hall of Fame basketball coach who died Monday at 93, made an impact on stars like Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Shaquille O’Neal, and Hakeem Olajuwon.
snippet: Pete Newell, the Hall of Fame basketball coach who died Monday at 93, made an impact on stars like Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Shaquille O’Neal, and Hakeem Olajuwon.
